properties.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 8 at 2:37PM PST until February 10 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Accumulating snow and damaging northeast winds possible.
Total snow accumulations of up to two inches possible. Winds
could gust as high as 60 mph.

* WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa
Monica Range. May impact Interstate 5 over the Grapevine.

* WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Monday morning.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions, reduced
visibility and strong cross winds. Affected roadways include
Interstate 5 and highway 14. Strong winds could cause tree
damage.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY MORNING
